name: ReverSteal
description:
Reverse everything as it was before the explosion in order to escape.

Game made for the Jam https://itch.io/jam/one-trick-pony-jam

Theme: Reversibility

Online multiplayer game (Photon PUN) for two players, each one is a thief. You must steal the greatest amount of money before the police catch you, for this you must rebuild the gate of the bank vault that you exploited.
